channel.title: Keyboard on Paul Strickland
channel.description: Recent content in Keyboard on Paul Strickland

item.title: The ErgoDox keyboard
item.description: I built an ErgoDox keyboard in 2013 from a kit sold by MassDrop. It was designed as a split ergonomic keyboard that is highly customisable. There’s a lot written about it on the internet that I can’t usefully add to, but these two posts were particularly useful to me: The ErgoDox keyboard a year in, and why you should get one Oh (Ergonomic) Keyboard, Where Art Thou? (archive) After spending a weekend building the keyboard and a few weeks learning how to program it and trying to type on it, it spent a long time being neglected.
